ViewObject.Name: MedDRAStandardReport
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT definition_type, ROUND((definition_count/total_crs_recs)*100) percent_of_use FROM (SELECT DECODE(SUBSTR(d.meddra_level,1,3), 'SMQ','SMQ','NMQ','NMQ','CMQ','CMQ', 'Single MedDRA term') definition_type, COUNT(*) definition_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crs_compounds p, crs_content c WHERE p.compound_id = c.compound_id AND p.compound_type = 'COMPOUND' AND c.release_status_flag = 'C') total_crs_recs FROM crs_compounds p, crs_content c, crs_risk_relations r, crs_risk_relation_purposes_vw a, crs_risk_definitions d WHERE p.compound_id = c.compound_id AND p.compound_type = 'COMPOUND' AND c.release_status_flag = 'C' AND c.crs_id = r.crs_id AND r.crs_risk_id = a.crs_risk_id AND a.risk_purpose_code = 'CD' AND r.crs_risk_id = d.crs_risk_id GROUP BY DECODE(SUBSTR(d.meddra_level,1,3), 'SMQ','SMQ','NMQ','NMQ','CMQ','CMQ','Single MedDRA term')) ORDER BY definition_type
